definition: the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: In this paper, the technological conditions of acorn bean jelly are mainly discussed.
sentences.chinese: 主要探討了橡子涼粉的生產工藝參數和配方。

sentences.english: Buckwheat Bean has a high nutritional and medicinal value.
sentences.chinese: 苦蕎涼粉具有較高的營養和藥用價值。

sentences.english: And in winter, there is hot bean jelly prepared for you.
sentences.chinese: 而冬天有專門的熱涼粉出售。

sentences.english: Chengde area residents have been eating grass jelly, more than 300 years of history.
sentences.chinese: 承德一帶居民食用涼粉已有300多年的歷史。

definition: rice noodle roll, a roll made from sheets of rice flour dough, steamed and stuffed with meat, vegetables etc
jelly snack made by kneading jelly fig seeds 愛玉子|爱玉子[ai4 yu4 zi3] in water and combining with flavorings (popular in Taiwan and Singapore)
sugar-coated Chinese hawthorn or other fruit on a stick/tanghulu
ta-a noodles or danzai noodles, popular snack originating from Tainan
knife-shaved noodles (pared or shaved into strips), a Shanxi specialty
turtle jelly, medicine made with powdered turtle shell and herbs/a similar product made without turtle shell and consumed as a dessert
